goal.en: This semester course focuses on the theme of ""thought"" and ""life"", selects (watches) related works and participates in interpretation and discussion in person. It is expected that students can reflect on reading, enhance their attention and understanding of life, enrich humanistic cultivation, listen to their own voice, and cultivate literary appreciation.
goal.ch: 本學期課程以「思想」與「人生」為主題，選讀（觀賞）相關作品並親身參與演繹、討論。希望同學能在平均培養聽說讀寫的能力之外，能在閱讀中反思，提升對於生命的關注與理解，充實人文涵養，傾聽自己的聲音，培養文學鑑賞力。

content.en:
The proposed film and script discussion lead students into the world of literature.
Appreciate the film ""Dead Poets Society"" and discuss it, so it is brought into the film critic/drama writing.
content.ch:
擬議影片及劇本討論帶領學生進入文學的世界。
欣賞影片《春風化雨》（Dead Poets Society）並討論之，由是帶入影評/劇評寫作。
讀曹禺劇本《雷雨》 ，並使學生親身參與讀劇演出。

textbook.ch: 曹禺《雷雨》。 自編教材。
